alert.note: Alert for Antelope (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 6:04PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Antelope County through 645 PM CDT... At 603 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northeast of Clearwater, or 6 miles northwest of Neligh, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Neligh around 620 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Oakdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
